AD_MODULE.NAME: B2B Integration - Purchase Order Management
AD_MODULE.DESCRIPTION: This module provides the functionality to engage in B2B Purchase Order management and B2B negotiation
AD_MODULE.HELP: Includes the basic framework for B2B Purchase Order Management and Negotiation. Purchase Orders can be published to the B2B Vendor Portal, and your Vendors will receive notifications via email and alerts. You may track how your vendors acknowledge, accept, reject or negotiate POs, and create Advanced Shipment Notices based on an agreed PO.
